mapper.insert: insert into tbl_product (product_name, cateCode, product_stock, product_price, product_details, product_size, product_corp, product_reviewcnt, product_img, product_thumbImg) values (#{productName}, #{cateCode}, #{productStock}, #{productPrice}, #{productDetails}, #{productSize}, #{productCorp}, #{productReviewcnt}, #{productImg}, #{productThumbImg})
